entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS3019 warning issued even when required to suppress CS3016 #68560
  • Remove unused imports on save #68556
  • [BUG] Move type to Classname.cs always puts file in project root #68555
  • Inline type hints cannot be triggered by shortcut #68554
    17.8
  • [SUGGESTION] Solution-wide analysis #104 #68553
  • "Move type to" code action using C# Dev Kit incorrectly moves the type to the root folder. #68550
    17.7 P4
  • CodeLens popup is empty 17.6.2 #68548
  • Incorrect error message on using static directive with alias to non-named type #68546
  • #line pragma false-positive error #68543

Closed

  • C# 11 required properties do not compile on dotnet 6 #68478
  • [LSP] [Bug]: Commas after non-array elements in JSON-like strings are colored incorrectly #68534

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge "interceptors" experimental feature to main #68564
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test PR to track down test failures as I don't want to pollute main t… #68563
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Correct interpolated string addition parts counting #68562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve collection literal parsing #68561
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove stale comments #68557
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve error reporting around inline array access. #68551
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • update System.CommandLine to the latest version #68549
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Gracefully handle no analyzers case in DiagnosticComputer #68545
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged
  • Avoid eagerly ordering the IMetadataAsSourceFileProviders #68544
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Performance, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix goto-def on partial methods in LSP #68559
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add more interceptors tests #68462
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #68327
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid calling EnsureEventListeners from Workspace.Dispose #68552
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Point manual publishing to public feed #68558
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Refine parsing of potentially ambiguous casts/index expressions with collection literals #68456
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix non-deterministic ordering of quick actions #68547
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure adequate SemanticModel coverage for inline arrays. #68509
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Extract a common helper for adding/getting private implementation class methods. #68502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Remove CPD attribute on DiaSymReader dependency #68523
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Implement IOperation support for `foreach` over an inline array. #68506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Fix missing comma classification in json classification #68535
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Include file-local name prefix in names of explicit interface implementations #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68524
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid cancellation exceptions in async queue implementation #68412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix indentation behavior of convert to block-body namespace #68428
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update language server publishing #68504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't report CLS compliance warnings for attributes on inacessible types #68527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • add review comment to sb files #68409
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
